thread.title: Man pronounced dead at the Magic Castle in Hollywood
thread.title_full: Man pronounced dead at the Magic Castle in Hollywood

author: Corina Knoll
title: Man pronounced dead at the Magic Castle in Hollywood
text:
Man pronounced dead at the Magic Castle in Hollywood Magic Castle Ricardo DeAratanha / Los Angeles Times Magic Castle Hotel & Club. Magic Castle Hotel & Club. (Ricardo DeAratanha / Los Angeles Times) Corina Knoll responded to the chateau-style building in the 7000 block of West Franklin Avenue about 7:25 p.m., agency spokeswoman Margaret Stewart said.
The investigation will be handled by the Los Angeles Police Department , she said. 
A watch commander with LAPD’s Hollywood station declined to comment on the incident, except to say that a detective was en route to the scene. 
The Magic Castle, which opened in 1963, bills itself as “the most extraordinary private club in the world where history, art and elegance combine to make miracles.” Caption 90 seconds: 4 stories you can't miss
